title.label: Really Great Game, Except For One Thing

content.label: Even amazing games have some problems. My only problem with this game is that there's a glitch that half the time it doesn't let you enter the Safe Haven after the boss battle. Other than that, I love it.

I had a GREAT time playing! The story and even the TUTORIAL was GREAT! It‚Äôs almost put‚Äôs the original game to shame! I really recommend you play this NOW!

I was looking for the original Oregon Trail we played more than 20 years ago on our Apple. This game, even though it used the title, was such a fraud. It just showed somebody shooting zombies in a vintage pixelated format with very defective coding. Very, very disappointing! I want my $2.99 back!

The Organ Trail is awesome, I love how the game features routes across the United States. The locations are very accurate too, my favorite is The Ozarks, they have a very nice 8-bit art style. I‚Äôm still playing this game through 2020! I love everything else in the game too, but my favorite is the traveling!

This is a fun little game, it reminds me of playing Yukon Trail as a kid on my family‚Äôs first PC.  There‚Äôs an annoying bug though where the game locks up after the final boss.  I am able to reload, fight him AGAIN and then finish but it‚Äôs pretty annoying, especially after spending $6, that the devs won‚Äôt fix it.  Also, the rating at the end of the game doesn‚Äôt take into account surviving party members or time elapsed in game, which seems silly.  Otherwise, great game

I keep encountering an issue with the end game boss where I can‚Äôt progress past the Touch to continue screen without reseting the game. As much as I love the end boss music, my biggest concern is that this resets my score to only count for miles traveled times the difficulty

title.label: Wonky control & paid w/ in app

content.label: I like the premise of the game. The control (when shooting) it is absolutely unnecessarily frustrating. Lost 2 stars because I couldn‚Äôt play it and also there‚Äôs in app purchase.
I have been playing this game for years and still haven‚Äôt gotten all the achievements unlocked. I rarely give 5 stars.. but this game is amazing.
This game and Black Paradox are the coolest games on the App Store

I love this game because when my dad showed me this it was hard but then the more I played the more I got better the I played the more I loved it.üòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòçüòç

I‚Äôm using an iPhone Xs and cannot control the shooter.  After tapping and dragging on the zombies, it simply doesn‚Äôt shoot.  Also when the character is near the top of the screen, zombies are too close and when you tap and drag, instead of shooting, it pulls the iPhone menu down.  Unusable.
Great game!

Best game on App Store! Download this now! Just like Oregon Trail! I loved it! I recommend beating the game with just the $2.99 app with no expansions bought! I liked the original way best I believe but who knows... I may edit this and say otherwise after beating it again on the expansions side...

But to me, the original ‚ÄúOrgan Trail‚Äù at 2.99 felt more scary and I was more enthrawled in my story. Very creepy soundtrack! Soundtrack tends to change in the expansions which I don‚Äôt care for due to the mood set in the game.... and you can choose paths in expansion, but honestly I prefer the $2.99 and having to use the station wagon! That to me is an incredible DND style story. I felt so sad and creeped out, and bc of my names a lot of funny humor. I love this game and give it a 10/10! Buy it!
Totally 5 stars, so fun to play. My parents said that they always played the Oregon trail when they were young, and this is just as fun!

Love the game, I bought the game and the expansions twice. The only and I mean the ONLY problem is when you beat the boss at the end the game will occasionally crash. Love this game for mobile and for steam.

I have played this game for over a year and still not bored with it. There is so much to do and to keep you busy and it gets WAY better if you buy the expansion packs. The game has a lot of gameplay and is definitely worth 5$ and should be priced more

I really enjoy the game, however, when the app is open on my iPhone X the time, battery, and service icons are still visible on the top side of the phone and it just looks really odd. Is there any fix for this that can be done?
I‚Äôve had this game in my library for years now and I still find myself downloading it and then playing it over and over again. I hope they come out with some sort of sequel.

title.label: Good defame but what is the point

content.label: I love this game but what is the point of having other people with you I haven‚Äôt beaten the game yet but the people don‚Äôt even help you they just sit there and eat your food and so on
It charged me for the expansion TWICE because at first I thought it didn‚Äôt go through and I‚Äôm still not able to play it :( other than ripping me off it‚Äôs a fun game

title.label: Good game but the ending wasn‚Äôt.

content.label: I just bought this game last night and played it three times. During the last play through I was able to make it to safe haven. Everyone in perfect health, car running great but a little low on ammo. Ok, now to collect 8 gas cans. Don‚Äôt ask me how this happened but I lost my entire part in less than 5 minutes. One touch from a zombie is an instant kill. My leader was attacked or touched by zombies too many times while scavenging, but was easily healed with medkits. I had several but wasn‚Äôt allowed to use them if a zombie touched me searching for the gas cans. That seemed like a low blow to me after making it this far in perfect health. After sacrificing my last teammate to have the zombies eat him to distract, I collected the remaining 3 gas cans. Strangely, I ended up collecting 13 of 8 gas cans and then the game was stuck and couldn‚Äôt get to the next part. Very frustrating and disappointed after thinking this was a great game up to this point. I‚Äôll try it again and see if I can get 8 of 8 cans cans this time.

I was on my way to a city and as soon as I say it boom car BROKEN sure it the organ trail but STILL besides I was eaten by zombies still the game is good and all oh and by the I was heartbroken to kill Clemens at the start so developers pls fix this I‚Äôve been playing this game since I was nine

name.label: fix this now or i will be mad

content.label: I wasted my money üí∞ for this trash

I love this game but whenever I get to the end of the boss fight at safe haven, I‚Äôm stuck on the ‚Äúcontinue to safe haven‚Äù screen and I‚Äôm forced to restart the game and do the whole boss fight again. If this is fixed it will be a perfect game to me.

title.label: Game is great except for this bug

content.label: I‚Äôve honestly had this game for years now. I can with 150% certainty that I love it! It‚Äôs definitely been a great time-killer on my deployments in the Navy. Even my fellow sailors have started playing. There is one problem though once you defeat the final boss at Safe Haven you‚Äôre given the onscreen message ‚ÄúYou entered safe haven. Tap anywhere to continue‚Äù but when you tap anywhere nothing happens. The hot fix is to restart the app but even then you only receive your bonus for distance travelled and nothing else. And that‚Äôs only after fighting the final boss a second time. This bug seems to be 3 years old  maybe older. I love this game and I would love it even more if this were fixed. Keep up the good work though!!!

To be honest, when I first downloaded this game I assumed it would be boring and far to expensive, but after having the game for a while I can tell you it‚Äôs worth every penny. Somehow the creators made the game incredibly intense and addicting with so many random frustrating yet amazing twists and turns. If your looking for a long term game you can always rely on, look no further.

Because retro video games are one of my favorite things, especially the Oregon Trail, I really was happy when I found this on the App Store. Although it is quite a price to pay, I find the game and expansion packs worth the money. I would especially recommend this game to anyone who enjoyed the Oregon Trail (or any other retro games) and/or a Walking Dead fan.
I love that this game is like the original but so much better I would recommend to anyone

Everything about this game is very well done. For how simple it is, it‚Äôs still expansive on options. I enjoy the occasional humor and i think the images for each location are so good! The music is also very fitting. Big fan:)
WHAT THE HECK I WAS AT SAFE HAVEN AND I NEEDED 8 GAS CANS I GOT SEVEN AND THERE WHERE NOT ANY MORE WHAT THE THIS A HUGE PROBLEM

Being from the ‚ÄúOregon Trail Generation‚Äù I loved playing the original Oregon Trail on the old apple computers as a kid and now the adult me can play Organ Trail on iOS!

These developers took the gameplay of the original Oregon Trail and made it more geared towards adults by adding zombies, bandits, and a dark survival twist to it!  Instead of ‚Äúhunting‚Äù now it‚Äôs ‚Äúscavenging‚Äù, instead of ‚Äúfording‚Äù it‚Äôs ‚Äúsneaking through horde‚Äù.  The music is a fantastic mix of ominous rocking chiptunes, synth, and real instruments, and the gameplay is a great balance of being incredibly fun and challenging, you really have to manage your resources just like the original Oregon Trail!  

If you‚Äôve played Death Road to Canada (also influenced by Oregon Trail), you‚Äôll love this!  Organ Trail plays much closer to the original Oregon Trail (it even has keyboard click sounds, yes!) and is much darker than Death Road, as Organ Trail does not have the wacky humor nor the character customization depth as Death Road (Organ Trail does have some dark humor moments though and you can unlock characters ‚Äúskins‚Äù if you‚Äôve purchased the add-on).  

Honestly, I love both games, and anyone who likes zombie survival games (especially with a retro look) will love this game,  Buying the add-ons is a no-brainer (heh) and TOTALLY worth it!  5 stars!!!!!!!!!

I'm sorry that I do not like the game.  I was so taken by the original back in 1980's that I thought this would be great.  I cannot maneuver it very well.  I run out of supplies often and the zombies appear way too many times for me.  I can't repair the car.  I'm stuck. And I'm on EASY.  I'm glad everyone else appears to be having fun.
How this has anything to do with the Oregon trail it‚Äôs a bad shooter game and should have been free

title.label: Awesome game, although a note for parents

content.label: This is an amazing game. However, a note to parents beware there is a bit of swearing in this game. So far I have seen the D-word, S-word and f bomb a few times, so just keep that in mind before you let your kids play it.

This game had me excited, to try relive some good childhood memories! Zombies, station wagons, and shooting your team members make this app a total waste of money!! This is not at all like the original that I had so much fun with.

title.label: Great Game, wish it got more updates

content.label: The story line, 8-bit theme, music are all great and worth paying for. I just really wish it got updated so it filled the screen for iPhone X+ screens

Made it all the way to the end on my best run ever, beat the octopus and the game seizes at the "you enter safe haven, touch anywhere to continue". Tried it multiple times, same thing. Deleted and will never play again.
Money scavenger doesn‚Äôt work in endless mode
Major fan of organ trail. Miss playing it. Update for iOS 12 for iPhone X phones! üòãüëçüì±
..........MOAR BRAAAAAAAINS........
Games fun until you have to scavenge then the controls are whack iPad user
This is my go-to road trip game, the Expansion is well worth it!

I have had this game forever since they brought to the App Store. Always my go to game just to kill some time plus it‚Äôs a great spin on Oregon trail. And the Atari graphics what‚Äôs not to love about this game.

Put many hours on the PS4 and PC version! Game is very addicting. My only complaint about the mobile version is that I wish there was touch screen joystick controls. Shooting and walking around by tapping the screen can be really difficult and has caused me a few accidental deaths.

Amazing game, very simple but addictive as hell. 
To those who can‚Äôt read that this says organ trail......y‚Äôall are dumb XD 
Also like to address that not everyone can afford to make things free when they spend time making something. So quit complaining about THREE DOLLARS. If it‚Äôs that much money then you shouldn‚Äôt be buying games because clearly you‚Äôre broke. 
This game not only brought me joy but the reviews made me laugh. So thank you!

title.label: I remember why I deleted it

content.label:
After purchasing all of the extensions, there‚Äôs a glitch that doesn‚Äôt allow me to finish the game. 

After defeating the final boss (giant Cthulhu) the screen says ‚Äúyou entered safe haven‚Äù and freezes. I can‚Äôt click anything. If I exit the app and reopen it, I have to face the final boss all over again. 

I deleted the app months ago for this reason. Re-downloaded it and it still does this! Super disappointing because I loved this game before this started happening. Any tips on how I can get around this?

Great game otherwise

Deleted this almost immediately. Could not use the game as directed. First phase I had to shoot zombies. Ok great, too bad I couldn‚Äôt get the character to move correctly. Followed the direction and the character would not move correctly. Very disappoint.

This is one of my favorite games, and since I can airplay this game on a tv, this is a great party game! Just have your friends pick a name, AirPlay the game on a tv, and play with your friends, and let them make some choices! This is one of the BEST games I have EVER played before, and I am a huge gamer. If I could, I would give it 10 stars!
This game is an addicting and fun retro party!
